name: The GEO Group, Inc.
description: The GEO Group, Inc. is a leading global provider of correctional, detention, and community reentry services. Founded in 1984 and headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, GEO operates a diverse array of facilities throughout the United States and internationally. The company's mission is to provide high-quality services that enhance public safety and promote successful rehabilitation for individuals in the criminal justice system. GEO manages a wide range of operations, including adult and juvenile correctional facilities, immigration detention centers, and residential reentry centers. The company emphasizes the importance of rehabilitative programs, offering educational, vocational, and treatment services aimed at reducing recidivism and supporting reintegration into society. GEO is committed to maintaining high standards of operational excellence and safety, utilizing advanced technology and best practices in facility management. With a focus on social responsibility, The GEO Group aims to foster positive relationships with the communities it serves and contribute to the overall improvement of public safety and rehabilitation efforts.

seo.meta_title: The GEO Group, Inc. | Leading Provider of Correctional and Detention Services
seo.meta_description: Learn about The GEO Group, Inc., a leader in correctional and detention services, focused on rehabilitation and community safety. Discover our facilities and programs.

faq.answer: George C. Zoley is the CEO of The GEO Group, Inc.

faq.answer: The GEO Group is headquartered in Boca Raton, Florida, USA.

faq.question: What types of facilities does GEO operate?
faq.answer: GEO operates adult and juvenile correctional facilities, immigration detention centers, and residential reentry centers.

faq.question: When was The GEO Group founded?
faq.answer: The GEO Group was founded in 1984.
